name: Ryan Toys Bmx
description:
Toys BMX brings awesome bike racing with beautifully crafted levels straight to your mobile. So grab your motorbike,
strap on your helmet and grab some airtime over obstacles and beat the clock on amazing off road circuits.
Jump obstacles on your bike, get as many points as you can!
HOW TO PLAY " Bike Race Games "
-Hit race button to boost the speed
-Hit break to stop in bike racing games
-Left/right button control as well as Tilt control provided
-Don’t hit any hurdle in your path
